description: Columbine (Aquilegia vulgaris var. flore-pleno 'Tower White') is an amazing plant species, with beautiful, star-shaped blooms of delicate white petals. It boasts a tall, thin stem and multiple blooms arranged in a neat fashion which makes it a stunning addition to any garden. Not only that, but itâ€™s incredibly low maintenance, preferring both a partial shade and full sun exposure and is ideal planted in beds and borders. It flowers freely in mid spring, continuously flowering into summer and is sure to bring joy to any garden.
